segments.text: I have been getting headaches almost every day lately .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you just started getting a lot of headaches ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I never had very many headaches before , but the last few weeks I have been getting a lot of them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you had any unusually stressful situations in your life lately ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My mother just passed away last Tuesday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sorry . How about sleep ? Are you getting enough rest ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have been working really hard , and sleep has not been a priority .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you bumped your head or fallen lately ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I haven ’ t hit my head .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am going to send you to a neurologist for a few tests .
segments.speaker: S2
